title: Offsides
description: There are three rules I live by:1. Never be late to football practice2. Show up for your friends and family3. Don't kiss Dani RobertsThe first two I've got down, no problem. That third one ...Well, it hasn't been a problem either. Until now.Dani and I have been friends since freshman year. We hang out all the time. And I've been in love with her for at least the last year. But I'm not a moron. I know I can't tell her, much less act on it.For one thing, she's been hung up on a guy from her hometown for as long as I've known her.For another, I'm not stupid enough to ruin our friendship like that.Until one night, a broken heart, and a karaoke bar ...Just like that, everything changes. And now I have to figure out how to make up for breaking that rule before I lose my best friend and the love of my life all at once.
author: Jerica MacMillan
